title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. [Provide steps to reproduce the issue here]
OB: When trying to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: The expected behavior is that the item should be selected when clicked on the first time.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. [Provide steps to select an item in the library outline view]
